name: Mojiken Studio
detail:
We are an indie game developer studio based in Surabaya, Indonesia. Our team is composed of passionate peoples who believes that fun games can bring positive impact on our lives.

Our goal as a game development company is to create video games that push the boundaries with seriously fun craftsmanship to deliver unforgettable experience.

works.name: When The Past Was Around / 往室
Ultra Space Battle Brawl / 超时空打球
A Raven Monologue / 乌鸦先生的独白
